thread.title: Dhoni made a scapegoat, can play for another 3-5 years: Sunil Gavaskar
thread.title_full: Dhoni made a scapegoat, can play for another 3-5 years: Sunil Gavaskar - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Dhoni made a scapegoat, can play for another 3-5 years: Sunil Gavaskar
text:
*New Delhi:* Sunil Gavaskar has firmly defended underfire captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni, saying the India limited overs captain has been made a mere scapegoat and is good enough to play for another three to five years.
*Sunil Gavaskar*
"It is unfortunate that he has been made a scapegoat. Nobody is raising questions against ... Â»
